scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const tsPath=path.join('build','http-server.ts');const jsPath=path.join('build','http-server.js');try{fs.chmodSync(path.join('build','index.js'),'755');}catch(error){if(error.code!=='ENOENT')throw error;}try{fs.rmSync(tsPath,{force:true});}catch(error){if(error.code!=='ENOENT')throw error;}try{fs.symlinkSync(path.basename(jsPath),tsPath);}catch(error){if(error.code==='ENOENT'&&error.path===jsPath){}else if(error.code!=='EEXIST'){throw error;}}"
